name: Dreamer (Alpha Jam Demo)
description:
- Made for the Haunted PS1 Wretched Weekend 1 game jam - Explore a weird and wonderful dreamscape as you seek out a way to wake up. Who knows what depths the journey will bring you to... This game is a very early WORK IN PROGRESS, so be aware that there is still quite a lot of content planned, bugs to be fixed, and dreams to be explored!Want to join my Discord server and keep up with my game development? Click Here!

Controls (Keyboard):

A/DRotateWWalkEInteract
EscapeQuit "Hold fast to dreams
For if dreams die..." "Life is a broken-winged bird
That cannot fly..." "Hold fast to dreams
For when dreams go..." "Life is a barren field
Frozen with snow."
- Langston Hughes

Credits (temporarily unavailable in game due to bug):
Developer - Adam "PixelDough" Worrell
Music / Sounds - Bert Cole
Modeling Help - Vladimere Lhore
Made with FMOD Studio by Firelight Technologies Pty Ltd.
